snippet: The bank said the unexpected pretax loss of 1.2 billion euros was because of litigation and restructuring costs.
abstract: Deutsche Bank reports unexpected pretax loss of 1.2 billion euros ($1.62 billion) for fourth quarter of 2013 because of heavy costs for litigation and restructuring.
lead_paragraph: The bank said the unexpected pretax loss of 1.2 billion euros was because of litigation and restructuring costs.
